articles.author: Ketrin Jochecová
articles.title: Greenland PM decries ‘very aggressive’ US posture ahead of Usha Vance, Mike Waltz visit - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Greenlandic and Danish politicians fume over trip by top allies of U.S. President Donald Trump.
articles.content: “We are now at a level where this cannot in any way be characterized as a harmless visit from a politicians wife. What is the national security adviser doing in Greenland? The only purpose is to demo… [+1377 chars]

articles.title: UK’s Heathrow defends decision to shut airport amid blame game - CNN
articles.description: Britain’s Heathrow defended its decision to shut down operations at Europe’s busiest airport on Friday as the blame game intensified over an 18-hour closure that cost airlines tens of millions of pounds and stranded thousands of passengers.
articles.content: Britains Heathrow defended its decision to shut down operations at Europes busiest airport on Friday as the blame game intensified over an 18-hour closure that cost airlines tens of millions of pound… [+1958 chars]
